summary: An evil is unleashed in a small town when a logging company sets up shop in the neighboring woods.
cast: Kevin Durand|Lukas Haas|Bianca Kajlich|Nick Damici|Heath Freeman|Ethan Khusidman|Sabina Gadecki|Steve Agee|Jacob Grigolia-Rosenbaum|Billy Paterson|Terry Fiore|Joe Pallister|Charles Parshley|Vincent Carbone|Minerva Scelza|Seth Hendricks|Ty Vaughn|Isabelle Sitterle|Kim St. Clair
title: Dark Was the Night
